resources.string: My name is Malhiya Arnib. I love coding and learning new skills! Some of my hobbies include painting and trying a different activity every few months (currently it’s trying to solve a Rubik’s cube faster). I also enjoy teaching concepts in computer science and other STEM subjects. The new insights and perspectives I learn from the different activities in my life allow me to grow personally and academically. I am eager to learn more about Android development and believe CodePath will provide me the skills, guidance, and support to pursue a successful career in this field!
